if your using vista AVOID this like the plague!!

Be sure to use your 'system restore' to recover your operating system.
why would you avoid this if i may ask? i have installed on windows 7 and other vista systems and never a problem?
Works perfectly on Windows 7, even after getting rid of that bugged Nero 9.

@slickinator

Yes of course, it was because after loading this software, my 'vista' operating system began to run at a virtual standstill, and then the screen blanked out.
I had to remove the laptop battery to turn it off because none of the buttons were responding when trying to shut it down.
Refitting the battery allowed me to go to 'system restore' to recover control of my operating system.
Hope that helps...........
